name: Facade (itch) (Famous Wolf Games)
description:
This game features bright flashing visuals, enjoy at your own risk.

*Overview*

The game seems simple, a platformer and a shooter. But, as you progress through 3 acts, you discover a more complex and intriguing story.

*Jam*

This game was made for the Brackeys 2022.1 Game jam.  The theme of this jam was "it is not real". This game incorporates this theme by having a narrator who is not real and many fake buttons.

*Controls*

Platformer - 'A,D' = Movement, 'Space'  = Jump

Shooter - 'W, A, S, D' = Movement, 'Right Click' = Shoot
